Defines

Functions

u32 SPI_FLASH_Init (void)
 Initializes peripherals used by the SPI flash driver.
void SPI_FLASH_SectorErase (u32 SectorAddr)
 Erases the specified FLASH sector.
void SPI_FLASH_BlockErase (u32 BlockAddr)
 Erases the specified FLASH block.
void SPI_FLASH_ChipErase (void)
 Erases the entire FLASH.
void SPI_FLASH_PageWrite (u8 *WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte)
 Writes block of data to the FLASH with a single WRITE cycle.
void SPI_FLASH_BufferWriteBy (u8 *WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte, pWriteFunction pSPI_FLASH_PageWriteFun)
 Writes block of data to the FLASH by CallBack function.
void SPI_FLASH_BufferRead (u8 *ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte)
 Reads a block of data from the FLASH.
void SPI_FLASH_BufferDualRead (u16 *ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte)
 Reads a block of data from the FLASH using Dual Output Mode.
u32 SPI_FLASH_ReadJEDECID (void)
 Reads JEDEC ID.
void SPI_FLASH_WriteStatus (u32 Value)
 Writes the new value to the Status Register.
u16 SPI_FLASH_SendByte (u8 byte)
 Sends a byte through the SPI interface and return the byte received from the SPI bus.
void SPI_FLASH_WriteEnable (void)
 Enables the write access to the FLASH.
void SPI_FLASH_WriteDisable (void)
 Disables the write access to the FLASH.
u8 SPI_FLASH_WaitForWriteEnd (void)
 Polls the status of the BUSY flag in the FLASH's status register and waits for the end of Flash writing.

void SPI_FLASH_BufferDualRead ( u16 *  ReadBuffer,
u32  ReadAddr,
u32  NumOfReadByte 
)

Reads a block of data from the FLASH using Dual Output Mode.

Parameters:
ReadBuffer: pointer to the buffer that receives the data read from the FLASH.
ReadAddr: FLASH's internal address to read from.
NumOfReadByte: number of half words to read from the FLASH.
Return values:
None

void SPI_FLASH_BufferWriteBy ( u8 *  WriteBuffer,
u32  WriteAddr,
u32  NumOfWriteByte,
pWriteFunction  pSPI_FLASH_PageWriteFun 
)

Writes block of data to the FLASH by CallBack function.

Parameters:
WriteBuffer: pointer to the buffer containing the data to be written to the FLASH.
WriteAddr: FLASH's internal address to write to.
NumOfWriteByte: number of bytes to write to the FLASH.
pSPI_FLASH_PageWriteFun: Callback function. Page Write interface.
Return values:
None
